name: Organic Avocado Box (6)
description: Six perfectly ripe organic Hass avocados from local farms.
reviews_summary: Always fresh and perfectly ripe. Great value for organic avocados.

name: Free-Range Eggs (dozen)
description: Farm-fresh free-range eggs from pasture-raised hens.
reviews_summary: Rich yolks and great taste. You can tell the difference from store-bought.

name: Artisan Sourdough Bread
description: Hand-crafted sourdough with 24-hour fermentation. Crusty outside, soft inside.
reviews_summary: Best sourdough in town. Perfect crust and tangy flavor.

name: Cold-Pressed Green Juice (6-pack)
description: Nutrient-packed cold-pressed juice with kale, spinach, apple, ginger, and lemon.
reviews_summary: Tastes fresh and energizing. Great way to start the morning.

name: Wild-Caught Salmon Fillet (lb)
description: Premium wild-caught Alaskan salmon, sustainably sourced.
reviews_summary: Incredible quality. Tastes like it was just caught. Best salmon available.
